'''''Hero's Homecoming''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. 

To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain the final page of [[A Nameless Adventurer's Notes]]. This can be done by interacting with the [[Tonatiuh#Goggles Left Behind by Someone|Goggles Left Behind by Someone]] on the [[Tonatiuh]] after completing the {{Quest|Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm}}.
